title: Blacksmith poppy?
body: Is this skin like never coming back or likeeeee will it come back like most of the other legacy skins :P {{champion:78}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: Per the [legacy ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins)guide, legacy skins do have an opportunity make a return in the store.  Until then, legacy skins could also be found through hextech crafting or mystery gifts.  Hope that helps, and good luck!
